product.name: Nikon 16-85mm f/3.5-5.6 G AF-S DX ED VR Lens
product.description:
Wide to long zoom lens, relatively expensive.
* slow * optically good * image stabilization * internal focus motor * focust speed moderately fast

product.name: Nikon 18-105 mm f/3.5-5.6 AF-S DX VR ED Lens
product.description:
Moderately cheap super zoom, often often found in kits.
Note! There are multiple versions of this lens

product.name: Nikon 18-200mm f/3.5-5.6 G ED-IF AF-S VR DX Lens
product.description:
Wide to long zoom lens with macro capabilities
* slow * macro capabilities * image stabilization * mechanically good * optically good

product.name: Nikon 18-55 mm f/3.5-5.6 G ED AF-S DX Lens
product.description:
Cheap normal zoom, often often found in kits.
Note! There are multiple versions of this lens

product.name: Nikon 18-70mm f/3.5-4.5G ED IF AF-S DX Lens
product.description:
Cheap normal zoom, old, kit lens of Nikon D70.
* Faster than contemporary kit lenses. * Longer range than contemporary kit lenses. * Built in silent wave motor.

product.name: Nikon 24-120mm f/3.5-5.6 G ED IF AF-S VR Lens
product.description:
Normal to long zoom lens
* full frame * image stabilization * optically poor * internal focus motor

product.name: Nikon 24-85mm f/2.8-4 AF-D Lens
product.description: * Old, from 2000 * full frame * external focus motor

product.name: Nikon 28-80mm f/3.3-5.6 AF G Lens
product.description:
Fast, old normal zoom lens.
* Old, from 2000 * full frame * external focus motor * fast focus speed * fast * optically acceptable, but soft in corners, noticable geometric distortions
There are several generations of this lens, and similar lenses.

product.name: Nikon 28-85 mm f/3.5-4.5 AF Lens
product.description:
Old full frame normal zoom
* Full frame

product.name: Nikon 50mm f/1.4 AF-D Lens
product.description:
Very fast long/normal lens, relatively expensive.
* very fast * full frame * mechanically very good * external focus motor * optically good to very good, however: * soft in the corners at wide apertures * low contrast at wide apertures * ugly bokeh at wide appertures

product.name: Nikon 50mm f/1.4 AF-S G Lens
product.description:
Very fast long/normal lens, relatively expensive.
* very fast * full frame * mechanically very good * internal focus motor * relativelay slow focus * optically good to very good, however: * soft in the corners at wide apertures * low contrast at wide apertures * ugly bokeh at wide appertures

product.name: Nikon 50mm f/1.8 AF Lens
product.description:
Fast, cheap, very old, long/normal prime lens
* Fast * External focus motor * Full frame * Optically very good
There are several different versions of this lens.

product.name: Nikon 50mm f/1.8 AF-D Lens
product.description:
Fast, cheap, long/normal prime lens
* Fast * External focus motor * Full frame * Optically very good
There are several different versions of this lens.

product.name: Nikon 50mm f/1.8 AF-S G Lens
product.description:
Fast, relatively cheap, long/normal prime lens
* Fast * Internal focus motor * Full frame
There are several different versions of this lens.

product.name: Nikon 55-200mm f/4-5.6 G ED AF-S DX Lens
product.description:
Cheap slow long zoom lens
* slow * internal focus motor * slow focus speed * optically decent * mechanically average, has plastic mount * light wight

product.name: Nikon 55-200mm f/4-5.6 G ED AF-S VR DX Lens
product.description:
Cheap long zoom lens, reasonably good
* slow * image stabilization * internal focus motor * acceptable focus speed * optically good, very sharp * mechanically average, has plastic mount * light wight

product.name: Nikon 70-210mm f/4 AF Lens
product.description:
Old slow long zoom lens
* slow * optically decent
* full frame * external focus motor * slow focus speed

product.name: Nikon 70-300mm f/4-5.6 AF Lens
product.description:
Bad old long zoom lens.
* slow * bad

product.name: Nikon 80-200mm f/2.8 AF Lens
product.description:
Old, fast long zoom lens.
* from 1988 * push-pull zoom
* fast * full frame * mechanically very good * external focus motor * slow focus speed * optically good
There is a large number of versions of this lens. See: http://www.kenrockwell.com/nikon/80-200mm-history.htm

product.name: Nikon 85mm f/1.8 AF-D
product.description:
Very Fast long lens, relatively expensive.
* very fast * full frame * mechanically very good * external focus motor * very fast focus speed * optically extremely good

product.name: Nikon D70 Camera
product.description:
* Electronic shutter, very high flash sync speed. * Low sensitivity, bad for low light. * 6 Mpix
Represents two products: * Nikon D70 * Nikon D70s

product.name: Nikon D90 Camera
product.description: * Mechanical shutter * Moderately good in high ISO

product.name: Nikon SB-24 Flash
product.description: *No optical slave *Few manual steps, to control amount of light.

product.name: Nikon SB-26 Flash
product.description: * Has optical slave capability.

product.name: Sigma 10-20mm f/4-5.6 AF EX DC HSM
product.description:
Ultra wide angle zoom lens.
* slow * optically very good * mechanically very good * internal focus motor * very fast focus speed

product.name: Sigma 18-50mm f/3.5-5.6 DC AF Lens
product.description:
Normal zoom lens, cheap.
* front lens rotates while focussing * optically acceptable, sharp but much cromatic aberations
Note: There are various 18-50mm lenses from Sigma, with big differences in quality.

product.name: Sigma 70-200mm f/2.8 EX DG HSM (Nikon) Lens
product.description:
Long zoom lens, relatively cheap
* fast * full frame * mechanically very good * heavy * optically good
There are four versions of this lens:
* 2005: Sigma AF 70-200mm f/2.8 EX DG HSM * 2006: Sigma AF 70-200mm f/2.8 EX DG Macro HSM * 2007: Sigma AF 70-200mm f/2.8 EX DG Macro HSM II * 2010: Sigma AF 70-200mm f/2.8 EX DG OS HSM

product.name: Tamron 17-50mm f/2.8 SP XR Di II LD [IF] Model A16N (Nikon) Lens
product.description:
High quality, but cheap, normal zoom.
* Fast: f/2.8 * Fast focus speed * Need (expensive) camera with focus motor * Optically very good, only cromatic aberation is a slight problem. * Mechanically the lens is only moderately good.
Note: There are three versions of this lens, which have different quality.
http://www.tamron.co.jp/en/data/lenses/list_dis.html

product.name: Tamron 17-50mm f/2.8 SP XR Di II LD [IF] VC Model B005 (Nikon) Lens
product.description:
High quality, but cheap, normal zoom.
* Fast: f/2.8 * Fast focus speed, even though internal motor is used. * Vibration reduction, which works very well. (4 stops claimed by manufacturer) * Optical performance is good, with sharp centers, but blurry corners at the wide end. * Mechanical quality???
Note: There are three versions of this lens, which have different quality.
http://www.tamron.co.jp/en/data/lenses/list_hispeed_di2.html

product.name: Tamron 17-50mm f/2.8 SP XR Di II LD [IF] Model A16NII (Nikon) Lens
product.description:
High quality, but cheap, normal zoom.
New untested version with internal focus motor.
* Fast: f/2.8 * internal focus motor * focus speed fast??? * Works with all cameras, because it has internal forcus motor. * Optically quality good??? * Mechanical quality moderately good???
Note: There are three versions of this lens, which have different quality.
http://www.tamron.co.jp/en/data/lenses/list_hispeed_di2.html

product.name: Tamron 18-200mm f/3.5-6.3 XR Di II LD [IF] (Nikon) Lens
product.description:
Very cheap wide to long zoom lens.
* Slow * Slow focus * External focus motor * Optically decent, but strong distortions

product.name: Tamron 28-200mm f/3.8-5.6 XR IF (Nikon) Lens
product.description:
Very cheap and compact normal to long zoom lens.
* good quality, optically and mechanically * Very small for its focal length * Slow

product.name: Tamron 70-300mm f/4.0-5.6 AF LD (Nikon) Lens
product.description:
Old and cheap long zoom lens
* Full frame * External focus motor * Mechanically probably decent * Front lens rotates when focussing * Opticaly probably decent
Note: There are several versions of this lens.

product.name: Tamron 70-300mm f/4.0-5.6 AF Di LD Macro (Nikon) Lens
product.description:
Cheap long zoom lens with macro capabilities
* Full frame * External focus motor * Mechanically good, but extends much when zooming * Front lens rotates when focussing * Opticaly good * good to very good sharpness * strong chomatic aberations * contrast suffers at long end
Note: There are several versions of this lens.

product.name: Tokina 16-50mm f/2.8 AT-X Pro DX (Nikon) Lens
product.description: High quality normal zoom. Fast focus speed, because external motor is used. Very good build quality. A very similar lens is sold by Pentax (DA* 16-50mm f/2.8), but the Tokina version is not weather protected.

product.name: Unknown Dummy Flash
product.description:
Placholder for unknown, but potentially interesting flashes.
Can be considered in price computations.

product.name: Unkown Dummy Lens
product.description:
Placholder for unknown, but potentially interesting lenses.
